title: Trump: 'I'm not even thinking about Elon. He's got a problem'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told CNN he's got no plans to talk to his former top White House advisor Elon Musk after their public feud turned nasty

title: D-Day wasn't 'a pleasant day for you,' Trump tells German leader
shortDescription: German Chancellor Friedrich Merz noted the June 6 D-Day anniversary while pressing Trump to end Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

title: What to know about SpaceX's government contracts after Trump's threat
shortDescription: President Trump has threatened to end government contracts with Elon Musk, prompting the SpaceX CEO to suggest decommissioning its Dragon spacecraft.

title: Six takeaways from the Trump-Musk feud
shortDescription: From disappointment to threats, here are six takeaways from the public spat between President Donald Trump and Elon Musk.

title: What does Trump's bill say about Medicaid? Dems claim people will die
shortDescription: Donald Trump's 'big beautiful bill; faces opposition over Medicaid cuts. Iowa's Sen. Joni Ernst went viral when she said "we are all going to die."

title: Daily Briefing: The Musk-Trump break-up
shortDescription: The U.S. president and the world's richest man escalated their feud. Here is the news to know on Friday.

title: Why is Trump having a military parade on June 14?
shortDescription: The upcoming military parade in DC will mark the US Army's 250th birthday, among other things.

title: Why the Trump-Musk feud might not end well for the world's richest man
shortDescription: Donald Trump's former allies say the political battlefield is littered with the scorched remains of those who have had a falling out with him.

title: 6 takeaways from Trump and Musk's ruptured relationship and wild feud
shortDescription: Trump and Musk exchanged wild accusations and threats in a breakup that blew up far beyond a fight over the president's signature legislative package.

title: Judge temporarily blocks Trump's ban on Harvard's foreign students
shortDescription: Trump cited national security concerns as justification for barring international students from entering the U.S. to pursue studies at Harvard.

title: 'You've lost your damn mind': Republicans cringe at Trump-Musk war
shortDescription: Congressional Republicans rallied behind the president, suggesting Musk is embarrassing himself with a tirade of social media posts.

title: See the country's listed in Trump's travel ban
shortDescription: President Trump issued a full travel ban from 12 nations and partially restricted entry from seven others, into the United States. The restrictions are scheduled to go into effect on June 9.

title: Trump accuses Biden of misusing autopen: What to know
shortDescription: Presidential use of the autopen is not illegal. And Trump admitted that his staff uses the device to mimic his signature on letters.

title: Nuevo veto migratorio de Trump afecta a varios países
shortDescription: El nuevo decreto presidencial impide el ingreso a Estados Unidos de ciudadanos de 12 países, mientras impone restricciones parciales a otros 7.

title: President Trump threatens Elon Musk's billions in government contracts
shortDescription: The broken alliance between the president and the world's richest man could threaten Musk's lucrative pending – and future – federal subsidies.

title: Musk-Trump timeline: Key events leading to their public feud
shortDescription: The public split between President Donald Trump and former White House adviser Elon Musk grew into an exchange of fiery comments on June 5.

title: Elon Musk turns on Trump: 'Time to drop the really big bomb'
shortDescription: Elon Musk alleged President Donald Trump's name is listed in classified files related to the financier and sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Trump travel ban: Why is each nation on the list?
shortDescription: Here is a closer look at why the administration says it is instituting full bans on foreign nationals traveling to the U.S. from 12 nations.

title: Trump admin must restore AmeriCorps programs in 24 states, judge rules
shortDescription: The judge's ruling applied only to Democratic-led states who sued in April to challenge what they said was Trump's unlawful dismantling of AmeriCorps.

title: Trump, Musk spar over 'big, beautiful bill'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump responded to Elon Musk's criticism of his "big, beautiful bill" with disappointment as Musk responded on X.

title: Expired milk, missing soap: Violations at Trump's NJ golf club
shortDescription: Multiple health code violations were reported at President Donald Trump's New Jersey golf club in May.

title: Trump says Russia, Ukraine may fight more to exhaust their hatred
shortDescription: Trump told German Chancellor Friedrich Merz that Russia and Ukraine were fighting like children in a park and might not want to be pulled apart yet.

title: Trump says why Egypt wasn't part of a travel ban he tied to attack
shortDescription: "Egypt has been a country that we deal with very closely. They have things under control," Trump said of the nation's exemption from his travel ban.
